      • createProximitySearchCenter

        public Address createProximitySearchCenter(Address address)
        Creates a new Proximity Search Center associated with this Contact Search Criteria, and copies the relevant fields from a given Geocodable (typically, an Address) into the Proximity Search Center.
        Parameters:
        address - a given Geocodable (typically, an Address) to be used as the search center
        Returns:
        the Proximity Search Center

      • createProximitySearchParams

        public ProximitySearchParameters createProximitySearchParams()
        Creates a new empty Proximity Search Parameters associated with this Contact Search Criteria,
        Returns:
        the Proximity Search Parameters created

      • createProximitySearchParams

        public ProximitySearchParameters createProximitySearchParams(java.lang.Boolean isDistanceBased,
                                                             java.lang.Integer number)
        Creates a new empty Proximity Search Parameters associated with this Contact Search Criteria, and populates it with the basic information required, using the system-default UnitOfDistance.
        Parameters:
        isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
        number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
        Returns:
        the Proximity Search Parameters created

      • createProximitySearchParams

        public ProximitySearchParameters createProximitySearchParams(java.lang.Boolean isDistanceBased,
                                                             java.lang.Integer number,
                                                             UnitOfDistance unitOfDistance)
        Creates a new Proximity Search Parameters associated with this Contact Search Criteria, and populates it with the basic information required.
        Parameters:
        isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
        number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
        unitOfDistance - For distance based searches, indicates the unit to be used for the search range; for ordinal searches, indicates what unit should be used for results (UnitOfDistance.TC_KILOMETER or UnitOfDistance.TC_MILE)
        Returns:
        the Proximity Search Parameters created

      • initializeProximitySearch

        public void initializeProximitySearch(java.util.List<Address> proximitySearchCenterChoices,
                                      Address initialProximitySearchCenter)
        Creates a copy of the proximitySearchCenterChoices and makes it available via getProximitySearchCenterChoices(). The method also initializes ProximitySearchCenter to a copy of initialProximitySearchCenter. If initialProximitySearchCenter is an element of proximitySearchCenterChoices, then ProximitySearchCenter will also be an element of the collection from getProximitySearchCenterChoices in the sense that equals() will return trues.
        Parameters:
        proximitySearchCenterChoices - Collection of addresses available as proximitySearchCenter
        initialProximitySearchCenter - The initial proximitySearchCenter

      • initializeSpecialistServices

        public void initializeSpecialistServices(java.util.List<SpecialistService> services)
        Clears the SpecialistServiceCodes array and repopulates it based on the specified services. services can be null in which case the SpecialistServiceCodes will be cleared.

      • isAllTagsRequired

        public java.lang.Boolean isAllTagsRequired()
        Gets the value of the AllTagsRequired field. If true, Contacts must have all the tags to match, if false, Contacts must have at least one of the tags to match.

      • isExternalSearch

        public boolean isExternalSearch()
        Determines whether this is a search against an external Contact system. If true, then the search will be made against the IContactSearchAdapter plugin.
        Returns:
        true if the search is against an external Contact system

      • isProximitySearch

        public boolean isProximitySearch()
        Checks if this search has been set up as a proximity search. To be true, ProximitySearchParameters must be non-null, and sufficient fields in PSP will be populated such that the application is able to perform the search.
        Specified by:
        isProximitySearch in interface com.guidewire.pl.system.service.search.CommonContactSearchCriteria
        Returns:
        true if a proximity search, or false if a regular search

      • isSearchFor

        public boolean isSearchFor(IType contactType)
        Determines whether this criteria is searching for contacts of the given type.
        Parameters:
        contactType - contact type
        Returns:
        true, if criteria is searching for contacts of the given type.

      • performSearch

        public IQueryBeanResult performSearch(BundleProvider bundleProvider)
        Performs the search and returns the results wrapped in a QueryProcessor. If the search type is set, and is not ContactSearchType.TC_INTERNAL then an external search is performed. In all other cases, an internal search is performed. An external search is routed through the contact search adapter. An internal search is routed through the address book adapter.
        Parameters:
        bundleProvider - the bundle that the search results will be added to
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor containing Contact objects that match this criteria

      • refresh

        public KeyableBean refresh()
        Refreshes this bean with the latest database version.

        This method does nothing if the bean is edited or inserted in its current bundle. If the bean no longer exists in the database, then null is returned. If the bean has been evicted from its bundle, then null is returned. Otherwise, this bean is returned, with its contents updated.

        Specified by:
        refresh in interface KeyableBean
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface Versionable

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Marks this bean for remove. A bean marked for remove will be deleted or retired when the transaction is committed. Once a bean is marked for remove, it cannot be switched to update, edit, or read.

        WARNING: This method is designed for simple custom entities which are normally not associated with other entities. Undesirable results may occur when used on out-of-box entities.

        Specified by:
        remove in interface KeyableBean
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Versionable

      • setupProximitySearch

        public ProximitySearchParameters setupProximitySearch(Address address,
                                                      java.lang.Boolean isDistanceBased,
                                                      java.lang.Integer number,
                                                      UnitOfDistance unitOfDistance)
        Creates a new Proximity Search Parameters and Proximity Search center associated with this Contact Search Criteria, and populates both with the basic information required.
        Parameters:
        address - a given Geocodable (typically, an Address) to be used as the search center
        isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
        number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
        unitOfDistance - For distance based searches, indicates the unit to be used for the search range; for ordinal searches, indicates what unit should be used for results (UnitOfDistance.TC_KILOMETER or UnitOfDistance.TC_MILE)
        Returns:
        the Proximity Search Parameters created

      • touch

        public void touch()
        Set's the version of the bean to the next value (i.e. the bean version original value+1) Multiple calls to this method on the same bean will result in the same value being used for the version (i.e. it is idempotent). Calling this method will force the bean to be written to the database and participate fully in the commit cycle e.g. pre-update rules will be run, etc.
        Specified by:
        touch in interface Versionable
